Alert

  • Usage guidelines
  • Alert options

Usage Guidelines

An alert is a dismissible message that gives users feedback when an in-page event occurs. Use alerts to notify users of the outcome of some action or process.

Do

  • Confirm to use that a process was successfully completed
  • Warn user that an item may need attention
  • Notify user that a process was unsuccessful or an error occurred

Don't

  • Place a call to action inside an alert
  • Display multiple messages at the same time

Alert options

Alerts come in three colors to represent three categories of Alerts: green for positive messages and confirmations, yellow for warnings, and red for incomplete operations or significant errors.
